[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#B46ED1″ divider_weight=”6px” _builder_version=”4.8.2″ transform_skew=”-20deg|0deg” max_width=”100px” height=”10px” custom_margin=”0px||20px||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.6″ text_font=”Poppins|300|||||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”2em” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Poppins||||||||” header_2_line_height=”1.4em” header_3_font=”Poppins||||||||” header_3_font_size=”26px” positioning=”relative” custom_margin=”|0px||0px|false|true” custom_margin_tablet=”|||0px|false|false” custom_margin_phone=”|||0vw|false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding=”||1px||false|false” header_2_font_size_tablet=”20px” header_2_font_size_phone=”18px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_3_font_size_tablet=”20px” header_3_font_size_phone=”18px” header_3_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

CosTech was founded in 1977 by Mohan Photay, a lone technician working with his dentist wife Diane, her associates and some local dentists. Mohan’s consistent quality, competitive price and friendly attitude made him very popular, and he had to take on more technicians to keep up with demand. In 2004, Mohan and Diane invited their technician son Neil and the current head ceramist, David to join them in leading the team as company directors. 

Over 40 years on, that core family team is still running CosTech today and receiving work from many of the original clients. There are fewer sideburn haircuts and more computers than Mohan remembers, but the principles remain the same. We still treat every new client with the same care and attention that made CosTech such a success. Dentistry may be changing, but a reliable laboratory is still a must-have for a prosperous dental practice. Get in touch with our team today and see what difference a good lab can make for you.

route="o gen content 3-|-description description text"]With so many restorations and technologies available on the market today, we pride ourselves in being your point of contact in bringing you new innovations in dentistry. We are here to help with case planning, troubleshooting and even as a knowledge base. Every person you will speak to at Costech has a passion for the trade and will always make every effort for a successful case.

content 3-|-description description text"]Innovation, dedication and communication is our mantra that keeps us passionate in the work we create and the service we provide.

Communication between dental surgeons and technicians is essential for successful cases and relationships.

The triquetra has been used in many cultures and it is generally accepted that the curves represent, man, woman and child together as a family, while the unbroken circle represents unity and eternity.

We are proud to use the triquetra as our flag to embody our ethos of treating every client and patient as we would our own family.[/ffb_param][/ffb_iconbox-10_2][/ffb_column_1][ffb_column_1 route="o gen content 1-|-title title text"]Our Story[/ffb_param][ffb_param route="o gen content 2-|-title title text"]Proudly celebrating 40 years of creating perfection[/ffb_param][ffb_param route="o gen content 3-|-description description text"]
CosTech® was established in 1977, then servicing only a handful of dentists with a small dedicated team of technicians. From these grass roots we have steadily grown providing a full service to hundreds of dental practices across the UK.

 

CosTech® has been DAMAS accredited since 2011 which means we are audited once a year to ensure our work is produced to consistently high standards, keeping the patients welfare in mind. Our team of GDC registered Costech® Managers and Technicians all have a PASSION to provide your smile team and your patient a service to smile for.
